content: this hat is worked in the round from the top down **sizes** adult s/m adult l shown in size adult s/m **finished measurements** circumference 18 23 depth 5½ 7 **materials** premier® yarns raffia™ 100% cellulose rayon 3 5oz/100g 131yds/120m 2166-14 cacao 2 balls both sizes hook us size g-6 4 mm or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle save time check your gauge **gauge** 20 sts x 11 rnds = 4 in patt **skills/techniques used in this pattern ** working in joined rounds working in back loops of stitches increasing magic_ring
